food.question: I am yellow, long, and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me!

hints.text: 💛 I'm often curved.
🌳 I grow on trees.
🎤 You can slip on my peel!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal.

hints.text: 🥛 Baby cows drink me.
🍦 You can make ice cream with me.
🦴 I'm good for your bones.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. A doctor stays away, if you eat me every day.

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one.
🥧 I can be used in pies.
✨ I'm a popular fruit!

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me.

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
👓 Eating me is good for your eyes!
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

food.question: I am a treat made of sugar, flour, and eggs, and often have frosting on top.

hints.text: 🎂 People sing "Happy Birthday" near me.
🎉 You can decorate me with candles.
🍰 I come in many different flavors.

food.question: I am a grain that is often served with stir-fry. I come in many colors, like white, brown, and black.

hints.text: 🍚 Many Asian countries eat me as a staple food.
💧 I need lots of water to grow.
🍣 I am often served with sushi.

food.question: I am a fruit with fuzzy skin and juicy green flesh. I'm named after a bird.

hints.text: 🐦 My name is the same as a flightless bird from New Zealand.
🥄 You can scoop me out with a spoon.
🟢 I am a good source of vitamin C.

food.question: I am made from fermented cabbage and have a sour taste. I'm often eaten in Germany.

hints.text: 🇩🇪 I am a popular side dish in Germany.
🔪 I'm made by chopping cabbage very finely.
🫙 I am often preserved in jars.

food.question: I am a type of bean used to make a popular spread. I am very popular in the Middle East.

hints.text: 🌱 I'm often made into a dip.
🧄 Garlic and lemon juice are often added to me.
🥙 You can eat me with pita bread.

food.question: I am a savory dish made from cooked grains, vegetables, and sometimes meat or cheese, baked in a casserole. I can be almost anything you want!

hints.text: 🔥 I'm usually cooked in the oven.
🧀 I can include pasta, rice, or potatoes as a base.
👪 I'm a great way to use up leftovers!

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm often seen in winter.
🌨️ You can make snowballs with me.
☃️ I cover the ground.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and live in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out during the day.
🕶️ You need sunglasses when I'm bright.
🌻 Plants love me.

weather.question: I come after the rain and I'm full of colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am curved.
💧 I need both sun and rain.
✨ People say there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a white fluffy thing that floats in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep.
🌬️ I am pushed by the wind.
☔ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. You need an umbrella when I come. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I make puddles.
☔ I can ruin your hair day.
🚰 I come from clouds.

weather.question: I am strong and can knock down trees, but you cannot see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I make leaves dance.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I am moving air.

weather.question: I am a frozen raindrop. I can hurt if I fall on your head. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a type of ice.
🤕 Ouch! I can be painful!
☄️ I am often seen during thunderstorms.

weather.question: I am like a blanket that covers the land, making it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am a cloud near the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I'm around.
👻 Some people think I'm spooky.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. I form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🏠 People prepare their homes before I arrive.
🌊 I bring lots of rain and flooding.

weather.question: I am a sudden spark of electricity in the sky, often followed by a loud crash. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be dangerous.
🌩️ I am often seen during thunderstorms.
💥 I am followed by thunder.
